Class arjuna.JavaSim.Distributions.NormalStream 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----arjuna.JavaSim.Distributions.RandomStream
           |
           +----arjuna.JavaSim.Distributions.NormalStream
public class NormalStream
extends RandomStream
Returns a number from a normal distribution with the given mean and standard deviation.

NormalStream(double, double)
Create stream with mean 'm' and standard deviation 'sd'.
NormalStream(double, double, int)
Create stream with mean 'm' and standard deviation 'sd'.
NormalStream(double, double, int, long, long)
Create stream with mean 'm' and standard deviation 'sd'.

getNumber()
Return a stream number.

NormalStream 
  public NormalStream(double m,
                      double sd)
Create stream with mean 'm' and standard deviation 'sd'.

NormalStream 
  public NormalStream(double m,
                      double sd,
                      int StreamSelect)
Create stream with mean 'm' and standard deviation 'sd'. Skip the first 'StreamSelect' values.

NormalStream 
  public NormalStream(double m,
                      double sd,
                      int StreamSelect,
                      long MGSeed,
                      long LCGSeed)
Create stream with mean 'm' and standard deviation 'sd'. Skip the first 'StreamSelect' values. Pass seeds 'MGSeed' and 'LCGSeed' to the base class.

getNumber 
  public double getNumber() throws IOException, ArithmeticException
Return a stream number. Use the polar method, due to Box, Muller and Marsaglia.Taken from Seminumerical Algorithms, Knuth, Addison-Wesley, p.117.
